name: Labor Treats General Depression
description:
Take on the role of a seasoned warehouse worker for mega-corp Aanaxom, where the company's motto is "Labor Treats General Depression!" So get out there and do some labor because that's what really makes people happy, especially the most important person to keep happy: beloved god CEO "Deph Payzus".

Prove your worth in the fight against their new AI system, just be careful not to lose your humanity in the process!

Or perhaps there is another way... a more... *collaborative* solution?

(Submission repurposed from Wowie Jam 4.0 (Collaborate with AI) with some bugfixes)
